Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அன்பறிவு ஆராய்ந்த சொல்வன்மை தூதுரைப்பார்க்கு இன்றி யமையாத மூன்று.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Love (to his sovereign), knowledge (of his affairs), and a discriminating power of speech (before other sovereigns) are the three sine qua non qualifications of an ambassador.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: An envoy stands before a foreign king, embodying three indispensable virtues.
Layered_Composition.Midground: A steadfast, glowing loyalty to his own king is shown as a light in his heart ('அன்பு'). A brilliant light of knowledge about the matters at hand shines from his mind ('அறிவு'). His speech is visualized as a skillful hand carefully choosing the perfect, most effective words from a floating array of possibilities ('ஆராய்ந்த சொல்வன்மை').
Layered_Composition.Background: A tense but successful diplomatic negotiation, where these three qualities are clearly leading to a favorable outcome.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The three absolutely essential qualities of an envoy are loyalty, knowledge, and the power of discerning speech.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The glowing heart (loyalty), glowing mind (knowledge), and the skillful hand choosing words (discerning speech) are the three core visuals.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A clear, intellectual light. The three virtues glow with a confident and powerful light, showing their importance.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A medium shot focusing on the envoy and the visualization of his three key skills in action.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with abstract and symbolic effects for the virtues.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The light from the three virtues illuminates the envoy, showing they are the source of his power.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Symbolic realism, with a touch of fantasy.

Negative_Prompt: disloyal envoy, ignorant envoy, clumsy speech, text artifacts.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the 'hand choosing words' effect.
